name: The Purple Complex
description:
The Purple Complex is a game where you climb a giant purple tower to get in the box. There are two players, Red Block and Blue Block. Only if both get to the top, they win. Otherwise, if they get too far from each other, they lose. Have fun raging at this game

Red Block - WASD

Blue Block - Arrow Keys

UPDATE LOG

  • 5-20-22:  Beta is out!
